keyword: calories in chick fil a chicken biscuit
title: Calories in Chick-fil-A Chicken Biscuit
meta_description: Learn calories in Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit, including full nutrition facts like protein, carbs, fat, sodium, and quick tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Standard Chick-fil-A Chicken Biscuit serving: breaded chicken filet on a buttermilk biscuit, as prepared and served fresh.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, preparation, portion size, and customizations. Check Chick-fil-A's official app or site for latest values.

quick_answer.text: One Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit contains ~440 kcal and 16 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

tweaks.label: Add one slice of American cheese

faqs.q: How many calories in a Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
What's the protein in Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: About 16 g of protein from the chicken and biscuit.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: Around 1270 mg, mostly from seasoning and breading.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in Chick-fil-A chicken biscuit?
faqs.a: Yes, 44 g total carbs, mainly from the biscuit.

faqs.q: Can I make it lower calorie at Chick-fil-A?
faqs.a: Opt for grilled chicken to reduce by ~150 kcal; skip add-ons.
